summary: Interactive visual project with animated elements including crackers burst effect, kiss-filled letters with visible text, and butterfly animations
architectural_notes: Letters need high contrast with background for visibility
Kiss graphics should be background decoration within letters, not overlay text
Butterflies require proper SVG or sprite rendering (not box placeholders)
known_issues: Butterflies currently rendering as boxes instead of proper shapes
Letters may be camouflaged against background
Text visibility compromised when filled with kiss graphics
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Decorative kiss mark icon in romantic style suitable for pattern background (kiss-mark.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Add a crackers burst animation effect that plays at an appropriate moment in the experience (e.g., during intro or transition)
Ensure letter text has sufficient contrast against the background so it is not camouflaged and remains clearly readable
Fill the letter area with kiss graphics as a background pattern that does not obscure or hide the text content
Fix butterfly rendering so they display as proper butterfly shapes instead of boxes

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure letters are not camouflaged against background with proper contrast
Fill letters with kiss graphics that don't hide the text
Fix butterflies to render as proper shapes instead of boxes
